name: El Que No Salta Es Paco
name_original: El Que No Salta Es Paco
description:
Choose a button to play and jump to the rhythm.

Hold the same button for 5 seconds to restart the game.

Credits:

Button assets - Kenney.nl
Font - Sins Gold
Audio - Freesound and YouTube

The rest - itssoisi & reinapepiada
